SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractInstallableFile
Describes an installable file with a set of run modes and (lazily evaluated) hash code.
AllPackageBuilder
Builds "all" package based on given set of content packages.
AutoDependenciesMode
Automatically generate dependencies between content packages based on file order in CONGA configuration.
BuildOutputTimestamp
Parse/convert ${project.build.outputTimestamp}.
BundleFile
Represents an OSGi bundle file referenced by CONGA.
CloudManagerAllPackageMojo
Builds an "all" content package dedicated for deployment via Adobe Cloud Manager for the given environment and node(s).
CloudManagerDispatcherConfigMojo
Builds an Dispatcher configuration ZIP file dedicated for deployment via Adobe Cloud Manager for the given environment and node(s).
ContentPackageFile
Generic representation of content package file.
HelpMojo
Display help information on conga-aem-maven-plugin.
Call mvn conga-aem:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
InstallableFile
Generic representation of an installable file (content package or OSGi bundle).
InstallPackagesMojo
Installs all AEM content packages and OSGi bundles to AEM which are referenced in a model.yaml generated by CONGA for a node.
ModelContentPackageFile
Represents a content package file generated or referenced by CONGA.
ModelParser
Parsers model.yaml files generated by CONGA.
PackageTypeValidation
How to validate package types to be included in "all" package.
PackageVersionMode
How to handle versions of packages and sub-packages inside "all" package.
RunModeOptimization
How to optimize author/publish run modes in resulting "all" package.
